CustomProperties.Name: MinimumHeight
CustomProperties.Tooltip: The minimum height the component should be to display correctly.

CustomProperties.Name: Submit
CustomProperties.Tooltip: A boolean to trigger the OnSubmit functionality. Only works when IsOnSubmitEnabled is set to true.

Rules.InvariantScript: "For international numbers include the country code"

If(
    IsBlankOrError(
        ColorValue( LookUp(
            TelephoneNumber.Theme,
            cat_name = "PrimaryColor3Value"
        ).cat_value
    )),
    RGBA(255, 0, 0, 1),
    ColorValue( LookUp(
        TelephoneNumber.Theme,
        cat_name = "PrimaryColor3Value"
    ).cat_value))

If(
    IsBlankOrError(
        ColorValue( LookUp(
            TelephoneNumber.Theme,
            cat_name = "PrimaryColor3TextValue"
        ).cat_value
    )),
   RGBA(255, 0, 0, 1),
    ColorValue( LookUp(
        TelephoneNumber.Theme,
        cat_name = "PrimaryColor3TextValue"
    ).cat_value))

If(
    IsBlankOrError(
        ColorValue( LookUp(
            TelephoneNumber.Theme,
            cat_name = "PrimaryColor1TextValue"
        ).cat_value
    )),
    RGBA(0, 0, 0, 1),
    ColorValue( LookUp(
        TelephoneNumber.Theme,
        cat_name = "PrimaryColor1TextValue"
    ).cat_value))

If(
    IsBlankOrError(
        ColorValue( LookUp(
            TelephoneNumber.Theme,
            cat_name = "PrimaryColor1Value"
        ).cat_value
    )),
    RGBA(255, 255, 255, 1),
    ColorValue( LookUp(
        TelephoneNumber.Theme,
        cat_name = "PrimaryColor1Value"
    ).cat_value))

If(
    IsBlankOrError(
        ColorValue( LookUp(
            TelephoneNumber.Theme,
            cat_name = "PrimaryColor1TextValue"
        ).cat_value
    )),
    RGBA(0, 0, 0, 1),
    ColorValue( LookUp(
        TelephoneNumber.Theme,
        cat_name = "PrimaryColor1TextValue"
    ).cat_value))
